welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bramhall, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom! Known for its picturesque parks and historic landmarks, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used for domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport houses all check-in, security, and boarding facilities.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limited free connection time. Additional time can be purchased for a fee.
